Text: Me̩ netirʼumi, ame̩ ku me̩ ranʼo̩kpakpa,
Me̩ ki kejurʼEbraham ata-me̩,
Todu Jihofa anyi Zayo̩n e̩do̩;
Me̩ netirʼumi, abo-mi,
O̩kpakpa e-mi me̩ru awa,
Me̩ ki chʼeju-me̩ nyʼate̩ gʼefojale,
Netirʼumi, ame̩ ku me̩ chemʼo̩kpakpa,
Todu ojudu ako ma je̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼukpo,
Mʼolu ji, mʼolu ji, kʼukpahiu bʼo̩la
I chʼuwe̩ je̩ ñw ohimini gbe̩ le̩ n?
Abe̩le̩ abo ki Jihofa la ma tane̩ adabiwa,
Omi, owñ chʼomi pitii chʼe̩ne̩ ki anyʼuma e̩do̩;
Kʼe̩ la gbenyo̩ Jihofa ki chʼo̩na-we̩,
Ma ahika tʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼoji lo̩ le̩ no̩ tane̩;
Todu omi che Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩,
Omi la mʼuko̩la-mi du tʼef alu-we̩ me̩,
Mʼolu ji, mʼolu ji,
I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi añʼo̩ o̩na
E̩wñ meji-i ke̩re̩bʼe̩—
Amo̩ma-we̩ mudaku,
Todule̩ e̩ gbʼe-i ke, uwe̩ e̩no̩bata,
abu kʼOndu-we̩ Jihofa,
oñ nadʼu tunyʼabo ku ma chʼuwe̩ o̩bata o̩wo̩,
